Articles.Content:
Hi,

Scott Manley's recent video got me very interested in kOS, however I have got a problem:

I want to use it to control my spacecraft when it is out of RT range. However, then my engine just shuts down, even if it is controlled by kOS.

Also kOS doesn't seem to have Attitude control. What am I doing wrong?

Thank you very much.

Kamik423

was in the same boat.

You need to enable the 'RT' config value (its a radio button on the right roughly in the middle) in the main kOS window.
